name: Find My Workout
description: Fitness class booking website for London
overview:
Find My Workout (www.findmyworkout.com) is a website that allows users to search for and book fitness classes across London, UK.

The site is targeted at both men and women, with over 1000 weekly classes to choose from - including aerobics, dance, yoga, pilates, boxing and kickboxing. Users can also take advantage of a variety of special offers, including 50% off classes, and Â£1 classes.

Each gym and studio has a content-rich profile page which gives users lots of relevant information about classes. As well as general gym and class descriptions, there are also images and videos of classes, to help users get a good idea of what to expect at those classes. Our ratings and reviews section also provides an additional valuable source of information.

Our aim is to allow health-conscious people to easily find fun and varied fitness classes on a single internet platform. We also provide an effective marketing platform for gyms and studios to sell their excess class inventory.
